Class CareerCenterStaffBoundary

java.lang.Object
boundary.BaseBoundary
boundary.CareerCenterStaffBoundary
public class CareerCenterStaffBoundary extends BaseBoundary
Console boundary for Career Center staff operations. Allows staff to review and approve internships, company representative registrations and withdrawal requests as well as generate simple reports.

This boundary provides the user interface for Career Center staff members to:

  • Review and approve/reject pending internship postings
  • Approve or reject company representative registrations
  • Process student withdrawal requests for applications
  • Generate filtered reports on internships
  • Change their own password
The interface follows a hierarchical menu structure with comprehensive error handling and user feedback.

      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • menu

      public void menu(String staffId)
      Main menu loop for career center staff.

      Displays the primary navigation menu and handles user input to direct to appropriate functionality. The menu includes:

      • Pending internship management
      • Company representative approval
      • Withdrawal request processing
      • Report generation
      • Password change
      • Logout
      The method runs in a continuous loop until the user chooses to logout. All exceptions are caught and handled gracefully with user-friendly messages.
      Parameters:
      staffId - login key of the currently authenticated staff user
      See Also:
      • handlePendingInternships(String)
      • handlePendingCompanyReps(String)
      • handlePendingWithdrawals(String)
      • handleReports(String)
